name: Verify User cannot purchase credits via top pane
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `User` role.

### Verify that:

- `User` **cannot** purchase credits via top pane.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with User role.

Verify that:

  • User cannot purchase credits via top pane.

Message: User agreement popup should be displayed!
